title: [Northward Trail, Snow Plains]
description: Snowflakes whirl around you.  Occasionally a vague form will materialize in the distance, only to disappear in a gust of blowing snow.  Nothing else can be seen in the dim haze but an endless sea of white in all directions.
Snowflakes whirl around you.  Occasionally a vague form will materialize in the distance, only to disappear in a gust of blowing snow.  Nothing else can be seen in the darkness.
paths: Obvious paths: north, northeast, east, southeast, south, southwest, west, northwest
